projects.title: Marathon Time Prediction
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a conceptual design with DFDs for a case-based machine learning model predicting marathon times.
 -  Implemented an algorithm for marathon time prediction using runner's data and historical performance.
 - Conducted experiments using Jupyter Notebook with datasets from Strava, Berlin Marathon, and other races, employing various regression models.
 - Evaluated models like Ridge Regression and Random Forest, with Random Forest achieving the best performance in predicting marathon times.
 - Compared Linear Regression and Gradient Boosting Machine (GBM) models for half-marathon predictions, finding GBM to be more accurate.

projects.title: Minimal Banking Website
projects.bodyText:
- Bankist is a minimalistic, feature-rich web application for seamless banking.
 -  Built using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for robust functionality.
 - Offers an aesthetically pleasing and user-friendly experience.
 - Allows users to open accounts and manage their finances efficiently.
 - Supports various banking operations through an intuitive interface.

projects.title: Confluence Club Management System
projects.bodyText:
-  A comprehensive web application designed to streamline the management of cultural clubs and events on campus.
 - Dedicated section for managing sponsorship information & Online registration.
 - facilitating better collaboration with sponsors resulting in increased funding support by approx 10 times.
 - Led to higher participation rates in every campus events

projects.title: Fund Fusion
projects.bodyText:
- Fundfusion is a feature-rich banking application for efficient financial management.
 -  Enables money transfers, loan requests, fund deposits and withdrawals, and transaction tracking.
 - Showcases advanced JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for a dynamic and interactive experience.
 - Includes user registration and authentication for secure access.
 - Features a user-friendly interface for seamless banking operations.
 - Use Demo users & pins as #user : js pin : 1111 #user : jd pin : 2222

projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer portfolio website built with React.
 -  Customizable and dynamic, allowing easy updates to data and images.
 - Includes support for dark mode.
